description: Software engineering issues, techniques, methodologies and technologies; software lifecycle activities: requirements analysis, architecture, design, testing, deployment, maintenance; project management; enterprise software systems; frameworks.Prereq: 3901 or 3902 or 3903 (560). Not open to students with credit for 3231 (757).
